name: The Dragon, Thyme
storyline: Damaged by the tides of Chaos, the lands surrounding Aromata have become perilous. You and Thyme will need every resource at your disposal to survive! Hidden within the fractured lands and toxic swamps are the relics of Aromata's citizens. By recovering these Trinkets and summoning them back, you'll be able to use their services to upgrade your gear!
summary:
The Dragon, Thyme is a 3D Action Platformer with RPG elements. As a fox-eared adventurer named Paprika, you'll run, jump, and swing through beautiful and treacherous lands along with your dragon companion, Thyme. Defeat the forces of Chaos and collect mystical Hourglasses to bring Order back to the world.

Platforming - Use platforming abilities inspired by classic 3D platformers including, wall running, double jumping, and swinging from your Grapple Sword!

Thyme the Dragon - Fight alongside your constant companion, Thyme the Dragon! Collect shards of the elements themselves from your fallen foes to empower Thyme, allowing them to fight using the powers of fire, water, air, and many more!

Explore - Damaged by the tides of Chaos, the lands surrounding Aromata have become perilous. You and Thyme will need every resource at your disposal to survive! Hidden within the fractured lands and toxic swamps are the relics of Aromata's citizens. By recovering these Trinkets and summoning them back, you'll be able to use their services to upgrade your gear!

The Dragon Thyme is a student project developed by the team at Panda Castle. The game features 9 unique levels to explore and 6 elements, each with type advantages against one another and abilities for Paprika to harness.
